title: "How Much Humanity Will AI-Generated Songs Need to Be Copyrightable? (Guest Column)"
excerpt: "Whether AI will kill the humanity of music remains debatable. What is not up for debate is that AI raises many legal issues. While courts have yet to weigh in, the U.S. Copyright Office has issued instructive decisions and made AI-related copyright issues a 2023 priority."
